text_block_list.text:
The evening of the Selection Race which she 
had not attended, I found Rice Shower weeping 
by a tree stump……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sob… U-Um… I'm sorry… but… please don't come any closer……
choice_data_list: What's wrong?
What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
…… Being near me will only bring you misfortune again. 
Because I'm such a good-for-nothing… I'll just end up 
causing you more trouble……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Even though I wanted to change myself… Even though 
I wanted to give it my all and participate in the race… 
in the end… I couldn't do a single thing!

Seeing the crying girl in front of me, I couldn't help but 
remember the look of determination she had the other day.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ………… But even so, I have to keep doing my best!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Because I already decided that I would participate 
in the next Selection Race! I'll make sure to be there, 
run well, and then……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to debut, compete in a lot of races…… 
I won't be a good-for-nothing anymore…!

Even though I didn't know her full story, it was undeniable that 
she was desperately trying to change. After all, I've witnessed 
her unwavering dedication and persistence to training firsthand.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sniff… I knew it… I knew it all along, I'm just…!
…… I can't just leave her like this!
choice_data_list: Rice Shower! Please let me coach you!
Rice Shower! Please let me coach you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Coach me? You mean… you want to become my trainer?
choice_data_list: If you're fine with that!
If you're fine with that!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
O-Of course! I would be really, really happy 
if you could become my trainer, but…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I really am a good-for-nothing… 
I know I'll end up causing lots of problems. 
I couldn't even show up to my race……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even considering all that, you're still okay with me…?
choice_data_list: Even so, I still want to support you.
Even so, I still want to support you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: W-Wow. You're like a big brother…
choice_data_list: A big brother?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: W-Wow. You're like a big sister…
choice_data_list: A big brother?
A big sister?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eeep! I-It's nothing, please don't mind what I said…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, um… well, I'll be in your care then, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: … I will do my best!!

Despite her lingering discomfort, a heartfelt 
smile appeared on Rice Shower's face.

And thus, today I was at the course, awaiting Rice Shower's 
arrival to begin our first training session together ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heave-ho, heave-ho…

There she was, carrying a massive backpack that threatened to 
tear at the seams. A tremendous thud echoed through the air 
as she dropped it to the ground and came running over.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Phew… I'm sorry for making you wait! I look forward to our training together!
choice_data_list: <size=34>What in the world is inside that massive bag…?</size>

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's umm… I've brought along all sorts of things 
just in case an accident might happen. Things like 
bandages or sports tape, for when I trip…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
… an umbrella for sudden rain showers, some spare change 
of clothes…… and in case something happens on the way 
back home, there's even mayonnaise for emergencies…!
choice_data_list: W-Wow… You're well prepared…
W-Wow… You're well prepared…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, haha… It's my first day of training, after all. 
I wanted to make sure I wouldn't be a burden… 
but maybe I went a bit too far…?
choice_data_list: A burden?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. Ever since I was young… I would 
always cause misfortune for others.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Kids around me would trip, or find their shoe laces 
snapping… and on really bad days there's even been 
times when a bird pooped on someone's head……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm a good-for-nothing endlessly 
causing trouble for others……

Even though it appeared to me as mere unlucky 
coincidences, I doubted Rice Shower would believe 
it if I told her. That's just the kind of person she is.
choice_data_list: (She really is a kind hearted girl…)
(She really is a kind hearted girl…)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: … Ahhh!! I started rambling on a bit…! I'm so sorry! I'm so sorry!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Let's get started with training, please!

Thus we began our first day of training. With unwavering 
determination, Rice Shower diligently completed each 
part of the training menu as instructed.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa…! … H-How was my time?
choice_data_list: <size=34>Amazing! You're even faster than I expected!</size>
<size=34>Amazing! You're even faster than I expected!</size>

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: … Really?! I-I'm so glad…!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Umm… Trainer, is it okay if I go for another lap? 
I-I'm still full of energy, so I can still run!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I want to double check if I've got that advice for 
handling corners you gave me earlier down pat!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And I'm starting to get a feel for how to 
increase my pace! I-Is it okay, or…?
choice_data_list: Of course! Knock yourself out!
Of course! Knock yourself out!

text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower was incredibly obedient and a quick learner. 
Thanks to that, the training went smoothly from start to finish.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah… it looks like the sun is about to set already…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I was having so much fun with running 
that I hadn't noticed the time at all…
choice_data_list: I'm glad you had fun training.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Y-Yeah! I had so much fun with today's training! 
You're so nice, after all… very much like a big 
brother, as I thought ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Y-Yeah! I had so much fun with today's training! 
You're so nice, after all… very much like a big 
sister, as I thought ——
(～Grrroowll～)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hyaaaah-ah-ahh, p-please excuse me!! Shh, dear stomach! Please be quiet…!!

…… As a reward for finishing our first day 
of training, I decided to treat her to something 
delicious out in town.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Umm, Trainer? Can I really eat anything I want…?
choice_data_list:
It's your reward, so feel free 
to pick anything you'd like!

It's your reward, so feel free 
to pick anything you'd like!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Anything…! Anything… 
Anything I want……

As she looked around, her gaze fixated on 
the banner hanging in front of a ramen shop, 
advertizing its "Explosive Mega DX" bowl…
Just as I was about to suggest we head on over ——

text_block_list.name: Ramen Stallkeeper
text_block_list.text:
The Explosive Mega DX is sold out for today! 
Please come visit us again tomorrow～!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah…! Aww……
choice_data_list: <size=34>… Rice, I'll get you all the toppings you want!</size>
<size=34>… Rice, I'll get you all the toppings you want!</size>

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ………! R-Really…?!

Witnessing Rice Shower's unexpectedly hearty appetite was 
a delightful surprise, and we continued sharing laughter and 
smiles together until our first day of training came to an end…
